system.requirements:
Tier 1: Sister of Battle E.Adv, Deny the Witch
Aptitudes: Willpower, Defence
system.effect: When using the Deny the Witch talent to make Evasion reactions against Psychic Powers, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to automatically pass the evasion test with Willpower Bonus Degrees of Success, as well as force the attacking psyker to make a Fear test against Fear 1 (+0 Fear Test).

description.value: When using the Deny the Witch talent to make Evasion reactions against Psychic Powers, the Sister can spend a Fate Point to automatically pass the evasion test with Willpower Bonus Degrees of Success, as well as force the attacking psyker to make a Fear test against Fear 1 (+0 Fear Test).
